column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Our waitress was very friendly
column2: it was our first time so she took the time to walk us through the menu
column3: and also gave us her recommendations. We ordered the paella ahead of time because it takes about 30-40min
column4: and started out with a pitcher of white peach sangria and a dish of bacon wrapped dates. Seems like a simple dish but it was very tasty ;)
